name: What's Under The Bed?
description:
"What's Under The Bed" is a game made in 3 hours for Trijam 143: Halloween Edition. The theme was sleepless nights, and so I ran with the fact that nearly every kid is scared of monsters under their bed or in their closet. 

How To Play: Mash the arrow keys as prompted to make the monsters go away. Try and keep your Sleep State bar (shown at the bottom of the screen) from hitting rock bottom.
